title: Halcyon’s Tips & Tricks #31 “GIFTING”
author: John "Halcyon" Styn
content:
After 19 Burns, my original Tips video on Gifting remains one of the most popular I’ve ever made. This is a 2017 update including a “what is a gift?” montage at the end.

Check out all of my Tips & Tricks videos like #12 “Artists” and #11 “Advice for Virgins”

NOTE: I am not an employee of Burning Man. Just an enthusiastic Participant.
